DOC.brief_summary: In trial , effect low high dose AN-PEP investigate gluten sensitive individual . Volunteers receive breakfast background ( 0.5 g ) gluten . Capsules take morning within 5 min start breakfast . Gastrointestinal fluid sample 3 hour measure gluten degradation . After 5 volunteer complete 3 test day , blind interim analysis perform third party base decide whether proceed low AN-PEP dose .
DOC.brief_title: Effect AN-PEP Enzyme Gluten Digestion Gluten Sensitive Individuals
